subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh told the Miami Heat that he, like LeBron James and Dwyane Wade, would be exercising the early termination option in his contract and forgoing the final two years on his deal — making him a free agent.
snippet: Chris Bosh told the Miami Heat that he, like LeBron James and Dwyane Wade, would be exercising the early termination option in his contract and forgoing the final two years on his deal — making him a free agent.
